text: hey there fellow travelers mark here
with Walters world and today we're in
the western islands off the south coast
of Iceland it's amazing here we've been
petting puffins and and today we have
for you our travel questions from some
of our fans you are fans and you know we
like to answer your question so our
first question today comes from Chris
Rodriguez and Chris asks mark how can i
travel the world for free now I've seen
a lot of websites lately and interviews
that people say no this guy travels the
world for free he has scammed the
airlines and everyone the thing is you
can't travel the world for free it's be
it's just not possible you need to have
money okay there's no way you can do it
for free
now there's ways you can save to travel
and there's ways you can save while
you're traveling and that's how you can
do a lot of these things on the cheap
like we do for example we try to go
offseason traveling when prices are
lower for plane tickets and hotels also
will pack picnic lunches so instead of
spending you know $80 for lunch here in
Iceland we go to the store we spend
maybe you know $30 instead buying food
there and we find these little things
you could do to save money you know like
if you're going if you go with friends
you can split the cost of hotel rooms
and food if you book early you can get
lower ticket prices these kind of things
you know trains in Europe if you buy a
few days in advance sometimes they're up
to 50% off so your money can go a lot
farther and another thing we do is we
actually use credit cards that have the
miles that you get so if I buy my ticket
for $1,000 to Europe I get my my miles
for flying plus a thousand miles for buy
the ticket with them so we find ways to
save up money to fly cheaper because now
you cannot travel the world for free I'm
sorry Chris it just doesn't work that
way
but we do have a lot of videos how to
save money for traveling and ways to
save money while traveling to help your
money go a little bit farther so thanks
Chris
contact with me I'll get you a t-shirt
now our next question comes from D cuz I
can't pronounce his screen name and D
wants to know is mark did you ever get
tired of traveling I'll be honest no I
don't I love traveling but sometimes
maybe I get a little weary or I'd say I
get like mini homesickness so sometimes
you know I miss my bed you know it's
like oh I miss my comfortable bed at
home or what's happened to me is what I
used to live abroad Halloween and
Thanksgiving I get a little homesick but
I never get tired of traveling I always
want to keep going but yes there are
some times that I do miss home and I do
miss my bed I miss relaxing there and
having some beers with my friends but in
general no I don't ever get tired of
traveling I want to keep doing this

here at Iceland you gotta rent a car
